titleStmt.title: Hallelujah. Or certain hymns, composed out of Scripture, to celebrate some special and publick occasions. By W.B. M.A. With two more lately composed by a wel-wisher to the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England. Upon occasion of those two glorious and most remarkable appearances of God for them, at Dunbar and Worcester: both upon that memorable day Septemb. 3. 1650. 1651.
titleStmt.author: Barton, William, 1598?-1678.

titleStmt.title: Hallelujah. Or certain hymns, composed out of Scripture, to celebrate some special and publick occasions. By W.B. M.A. With two more lately composed by a wel-wisher to the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England. Upon occasion of those two glorious and most remarkable appearances of God for them, at Dunbar and Worcester: both upon that memorable day Septemb. 3. 1650. 1651.
titleStmt.author: Barton, William, 1598?-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock, and are to be sold in Popes head Alley,

notesStmt.note: W.B. = William Barton. Barton's name is given in an acrostic poem following page 52.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
